channel.description: Recent content in geography on Rusland 1

item.title: Size Matters
item.description: Largest in the whole world First, try to understand the country, or at least attempt to. That’s where you start – but that’s quite the task. Of all the countries in the world (about 200 ), Россия (in terms of area) is by far the largest , and it is not easily comprehended.
